import openSocket from'socket.io-client';import{createServer}from"http";import{Server}from"socket.io";var socket=openSocket('http://localhost:3000');var httpServer=createServer();var io=new Server(httpServer,{});io.on("connection",function(socket){console.log(socket);socket.emit('timer',new Date());});httpServer.listen(3000);function subscribeToTimer(cb){socket.on('timer',function(timestamp){return cb(null,timestamp);});// socket.emit('subscribeToTimer', 1000);
}export{subscribeToTimer};
